availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward S. Wilson (Richland County, IL, attorney)

body.p: Richland County, Illinois, state's attorney. Illinois native. Son of Isaac N. Wilson and Hannah H. Wilson. Attended school in Crawford County, Illinois, in 1850. Attorney in Crawford County in 1860. State's attorney in Richland County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Crawford County, p. 244B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Crawford County, Palestine, p. 397.
"Edward Smith Wilson (1839-1923)," Find A Grave, Memorial 35457098, accessed March 29, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35457098.
KYR-0001-006-0001.
